Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from web_dashboard import AlphaDashboard
import json

dashboard = AlphaDashboard\(\)
status = dashboard.get_orchestrator_status\(\)
print\(''Orchestrator Status:''\)
print\(json.dumps\(status, indent=2\)\)
print\(\)
print\(''Status meanings:''\)
print\(''  active: Process running + log updated < 5 min ago''\)
print\(''  idle: Log updated < 5 min ago but process not running''\)
print\(''  stale: Process running but log not updated recently''\)
print\(''  stopped: Log exists but not updated + no process''\)
print\(''  unknown: No log file and no process found''\)
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from pathlib import Path
from credential_manager import CredentialManager
import machine_lib as ml

print\(''Testing machine miner authentication...''\)
credential_manager = CredentialManager\(\)

if credential_manager.load_from_file\(Path\(''./cookie.txt''\)\):
    if credential_manager.validate_credentials\(\):
        print\(''[AUTH] Authentication successful''\)
        session = credential_manager.get_session\(\)
        print\(f''Session headers: {list\(session.headers.keys\(\)\)}''\)
        
        # Test creating WorldQuantBrain with session
        brain = ml.WorldQuantBrain\(session=session\)
        print\(''[SUCCESS] WorldQuantBrain initialized with cookie session''\)
    else:
        print\(''[ERROR] Cookie validation failed''\)
else:
    print\(''[ERROR] Failed to load cookie''\)
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from pathlib import Path
from credential_manager import CredentialManager
import machine_lib as ml

print\(''Testing machine miner with API headers...''\)
credential_manager = CredentialManager\(\)

if credential_manager.load_from_file\(Path\(''./cookie.txt''\)\):
    if credential_manager.validate_credentials\(\):
        print\(''[AUTH] Authentication successful''\)
        session = credential_manager.get_session\(\)
        print\(f''Session headers: {dict\(session.headers\)}''\)
        
        # Test creating WorldQuantBrain with session
        brain = ml.WorldQuantBrain\(session=session\)
        print\(''[SUCCESS] WorldQuantBrain initialized''\)
        
        # Test getting data fields
        print\(''Testing get_datafields API call...''\)
        try:
            fields_df = brain.get_datafields\(region=''USA'', universe=''TOP3000''\)
            print\(f''[SUCCESS] Got {len\(fields_df\)} data fields''\)
        except Exception as e:
            print\(f''[ERROR] API call failed: {e}''\)
    else:
        print\(''[ERROR] Cookie validation failed''\)
else:
    print\(''[ERROR] Failed to load cookie''\)
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import logging
logging.basicConfig\(level=logging.INFO, format=''%\(levelname\)s - %\(message\)s''\)

from pathlib import Path
from credential_manager import CredentialManager
import machine_lib as ml

print\(''Testing machine miner with improved error handling...''\)
credential_manager = CredentialManager\(\)

if credential_manager.load_from_file\(Path\(''./cookie.txt''\)\):
    if credential_manager.validate_credentials\(\):
        print\(''[AUTH] Authentication successful''\)
        session = credential_manager.get_session\(\)
        
        # Test creating WorldQuantBrain with session
        brain = ml.WorldQuantBrain\(session=session\)
        print\(''[SUCCESS] WorldQuantBrain initialized''\)
        
        # Test getting data fields
        print\(''Testing get_datafields API call...''\)
        try:
            fields_df = brain.get_datafields\(region=''USA'', universe=''TOP3000''\)
            print\(f''[SUCCESS] Got {len\(fields_df\)} data fields''\)
        except Exception as e:
            import traceback
            print\(f''[ERROR] API call failed: {e}''\)
            traceback.print_exc\(\)
    else:
        print\(''[ERROR] Cookie validation failed''\)
else:
    print\(''[ERROR] Failed to load cookie''\)
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from pathlib import Path
from credential_manager import CredentialManager

credential_manager = CredentialManager\(\)

print\(''Testing cookie validity...''\)
if credential_manager.load_from_file\(Path\(''./cookie.txt''\)\):
    if credential_manager.validate_credentials\(\):
        print\(''[SUCCESS] Cookie is still valid''\)
        session = credential_manager.get_session\(\)
        
        # Test API call
        response = session.get\(''https://api.worldquantbrain.com/users/self''\)
        print\(f''API Response: {response.status_code}''\)
        if response.status_code == 200:
            print\(''Authentication working correctly''\)
        else:
            print\(f''Authentication failed: {response.text[:200]}''\)
    else:
        print\(''[ERROR] Cookie validation failed - cookie may have expired''\)
else:
    print\(''[ERROR] Failed to load cookie''\)
")
